page.title: 16PONTINS BROADREEDS,SELSEY,1
page.content: {Pontins}bought{Broadreeds}in 1962 and it grew to 35 acres in 23 years.It is owned by{Bass Breweries.}The great grandma of one of the children remembers the original Broadreeds house being built.It was called Broadreeds because it was thatched with reeds from{Norfolk Broads.}It is now under the sea. Pontins Broadreeds has 440 chalets and up to 4 people can sleep in each.There are 175 people on the staff-the{chalet staff}are local but the rest of the staff are from all over the country.Some wear a uniform and are called{Blue coats.}Every summer about the same amount of {holiday makers}come.The average number is 1100 a week.Pontins is open at Christmas and Easter too.There is a heated swimming pool,and full size snooker and pool tables.We were not supposed to go in as we weren't 15.
